definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Carboniferous volcanic rocks originated from partial melting of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 石炭纪火山岩为部分熔融作用的产物。

sentences.english: The reef enriches the Carboniferous reef types.
sentences.chinese: 丰富了石炭纪生物礁的类型。

sentences.english: The characteristics of carboniferous strata and milleral resources in guangxi were briefly in troducted.
sentences.chinese: 概要介绍广西石炭纪地层特征及矿产资源。

sentences.english: In Early Carboniferous, Tianshan mountains entered an intraplate evolution stage.
sentences.chinese: 从石炭纪开始天山地区进入陆内演化阶段。

definition: Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
Pleistocene (geological epoch from 2m years ago, covering the most recent ice ages)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
